snippet: The giant entertainment company continued to see growth in ESPN and other cable channels, as well as its theme parks, but had to take a $200 million write down for its failed science fiction epic "John Carter.''
abstract: The giant entertainment company continued to see growth in ESPN and other cable channels, as well as its theme parks, but had to take a $200 million write down for its failed science fiction epic "John Carter.''

headline.main: ESPN and Theme Parks Drive Disney Profits
headline.print_headline: Profit Grows 21% at Disney on Cable TV Gains and a Surge in Resorts Business
